description:
Company Description

Prophecius Technologies provides web and mobile app development services around the world. With a team of 41 developers, we have worked with over 40 clients and have experience in the latest technologies, including Reactjs, Nodejs, MongoDB, Laravel, PHP, React Native, Flutter, Kotlin, Swift, Blockchain, and Python. Our end-to-end project delivery ensures that clients receive the best services for their website, mobile application, or branding needs.

Role Description

This is a contract remote role for a Freelance Business Development Executive, reporting to the Business Development Manager. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying and closing sales leads, managing customer relationships, and contributing to the overall growth strategy of the company.

Qualifications
• 3+ years of experience in B2B sales, with a proven track record of achieving sales targets
• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Strong negotiation skills and ability to close deals
• Comfortable working in a remote environment and managing a sales pipeline
• Understanding and experience with web and mobile app development is preferred
• Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field is preferred

We are looking for a motivated self-starter who is passionate about sales and able to work independently. If you have experience in B2B sales and are comfortable working in a remote environment, we encourage you to apply.
